attributes.action: to phase out funding for students taking ‘Equivalent or Lower Qualifications’ (ELQs)...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1.  Decision:  John Denham, The Secretary of State for Innovation, Universities and Skills, has announced that, from 2008/09, he will phase out funding for the majority of students in England and Northern Ireland who are studying for a qualification that is equivalent to, or lower than, a qualification that they already hold (e.g. graduates studying undergraduate courses; or those taking second masters degrees).  However, this runs counter to the Leitch agenda on skills and life-long learning and indeed to the Government’s own pronouncements about nurturing the talents of all its people – including Denham’s own assertion that ‘every second one of us must make up our skill lack for Britain to succeed’[1].

rejection.details:
Your title suggests you wish the Government to phase out funding, when presumably you want the opposite. There is an existing petition.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ELQFunding/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
